title: Smoked trout kedgeree with quail's eggs
ingredients: ['300 g (10½ oz) long-grain white rice', '1 litre (1¾ pints) vegetable stock or water', "8 quail's eggs", '1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '1 large onion, finely chopped', '1 fresh red chilli, seeded and sliced', '1 tbsp korma curry paste', '3 tbsp Greek-style yogurt', '280 g (10 oz) smoked trout fillets, skinned and flaked into large pieces', '4 tbsp chopped fresh coriander', '55 g (2 oz) toasted flaked almonds', 'salt']
